about_the_game:
The Steam Starter Pack is perfect for new players looking to kick start their Roman domination in Romans Age Of Caesar. Whether you mean to farm peacefully, engage in political mind games or seek vengeance on your sworn enemies, this starter pack enables players to gain a vital head start as they reach for the crown. Enjoy 100 Trajans, 3 packs of random cards and 3 packs of military card packs, and 7 bonus cards to boost your research and other vital areas of gameplay:



Please Note: As with all DLC on Steam and redeemable Romans Age Of Caesar codes, only one Starter Pack can be redeemed per Romans account.
